main.name: Ghulam Rasool
main.description: I love to code and breathe React, ReactNative, Ionic, NodeJS, Angular and most Importan PHP(Laravel)
main.bio: Experienced Principal Software Engineer with expertise in all aspects of the software development life cycle, including requirements analysis, design, development, and production support. Self-directed and motivated Software Engineer experienced working effectively in dynamic environments. Fluent in (PHP, React, React Native, Ionic, AngularJs, Laravel, CodeIgniter, MySQL, No-SQL) and PHP, Python programming languages. Decisive problem-solver and an organized leader able to handle diverse project types and sizes. Offering 12 years' experience and the drive to make a difference for business and customers. Passionate to learn new technologies and I'm a solution provider.
